generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a Mercedes-Benz emblem on the hood, indicating the viewpoint is from a vehicle on the road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the edge of the road, bordered by white posts and adjacent to the buildings.
- building: Multiple buildings are present, including a black and brick building with a tattoo shop sign and a white building with ornate windows.
- fence: A low fence made of white posts is visible along the sidewalk in front of the buildings.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, mounted on poles.
- traffic sign: A triangular "yield" sign is visible on a pole at the intersection.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- terrain: Grass is visible along the sidewalk and in front of the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing partly cloudy.
- car: Several cars are parked along the street and in the background.
- truck: A white van is visible parked on the right side of the street.
- motorcycle: No motorcycles are visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycles are visible in the image.
- bus: No buses are visible in the image.
- train: No trains are visible in the image.
- person: No people are visible in the image.
- rider: No riders are visible in the image.
